title: [Health] Smoking greatly increases the risk of COVID-19 mortality and morbidity in young adults

[Medicine] New study shows that SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted efficiently via direct contact and via the air (via respiratory droplets and/or aerosols) between ferrets, 1 to 3 days and 3 to 7 days after exposure respectively, providing experimental evidence of robust transmission of SARS-CoV-2 via the air
